017package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
021import static org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteUtils.*;
022import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.*;
025import java.util.*;
026import java.util.function.*;
027
028import org.apache.juneau.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
033import org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.*;
034import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
035import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
036
037/**
038 * Contains the meta-data about a Java method on a REST proxy class.
039 *
040 * <p>
041 * Captures the information in {@link RemoteOp @RemoteOp} annotations for caching and reuse.
042 *
043 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
044 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/RestProxyBasics">REST Proxy Basics</a>
045 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestClientBasics">juneau-rest-client Basics</a>
046 * </ul>
047 */
048public class RemoteOperationMeta {
049
050   private final String httpMethod;
051   private final String fullPath;
052   private final RemoteOperationArg[] pathArgs, queryArgs, headerArgs, formDataArgs;
053   private final RemoteOperationBeanArg[] requestArgs;
054   private final RemoteOperationArg contentArg;
055   private final RemoteOperationReturn methodReturn;
056   private final Class<?>[] exceptions;
057   
058   // Method-level annotations with defaults (9.2.0)
059   private final Map<String,String> pathDefaults, queryDefaults, headerDefaults, formDataDefaults;
060   private final String contentDefault;
061
062   /**
063    * Constructor.
064    *
065    * @param parentPath The absolute URI of the REST interface backing the interface proxy.
066    * @param m The Java method.
067    * @param defaultMethod The default HTTP method if not specified through annotation.
068    */
069   public RemoteOperationMeta(final String parentPath, Method m, String defaultMethod) {
070      Builder b = new Builder(parentPath, m, defaultMethod);
071      this.httpMethod = b.httpMethod;
072      this.fullPath = b.fullPath;
073      this.pathArgs = b.pathArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.pathArgs.size()]);
074      this.queryArgs = b.queryArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.queryArgs.size()]);
075      this.formDataArgs = b.formDataArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.formDataArgs.size()]);
076      this.headerArgs = b.headerArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationArg[b.headerArgs.size()]);
077      this.requestArgs = b.requestArgs.toArray(new RemoteOperationBeanArg[b.requestArgs.size()]);
078      this.contentArg = b.bodyArg;
079      this.methodReturn = b.methodReturn;
080      this.exceptions = m.getExceptionTypes();
081      this.pathDefaults = Collections.unmodifiableMap(b.pathDefaults);
082      this.queryDefaults = Collections.unmodifiableMap(b.queryDefaults);
083      this.headerDefaults = Collections.unmodifiableMap(b.headerDefaults);
084      this.formDataDefaults = Collections.unmodifiableMap(b.formDataDefaults);
085      this.contentDefault = b.contentDefault;
086   }
087
088   private static class Builder {
089      String httpMethod, fullPath, path;
090      List<RemoteOperationArg>
091         pathArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
092         queryArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
093         headerArgs = new LinkedList<>(),
094         formDataArgs = new LinkedList<>();
095      List<RemoteOperationBeanArg>
096         requestArgs = new LinkedList<>();
097      RemoteOperationArg bodyArg;
098      RemoteOperationReturn methodReturn;
099      Map<String,String> 
100         pathDefaults = new LinkedHashMap<>(),
101         queryDefaults = new LinkedHashMap<>(),
102         headerDefaults = new LinkedHashMap<>(),
103         formDataDefaults = new LinkedHashMap<>();
104      String contentDefault = null;
105
106      Builder(String parentPath, Method m, String defaultMethod) {
107
108         MethodInfo mi = MethodInfo.of(m);
109
110         AnnotationList al = mi.getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
111         if (al.isEmpty())
112            al = mi.getReturnType().unwrap(Value.class,Optional.class).getAnnotationList(REMOTE_OP_GROUP);
113
114         Value<String> _httpMethod = Value.empty(), _path = Value.empty();
115         al.stream().map(x -> x.getName().substring(6).toUpperCase()).filter(x -> ! x.equals("OP")).forEach(x -> _httpMethod.set(x));
116         al.forEachValue(String.class, "method", NOT_EMPTY, x -> _httpMethod.set(x.trim().toUpperCase()));
117         al.forEachValue(String.class, "path", NOT_EMPTY, x-> _path.set(x.trim()));
118         httpMethod = _httpMethod.orElse("").trim();
119         path = _path.orElse("").trim();
120
121         Value<String> value = Value.empty();
122         al.forEach(RemoteOp.class, x -> isNotEmpty(x.inner().value().trim()), x -> value.set(x.inner().value().trim()));
123
124         if (value.isPresent()) {
125            String v = value.get();
126            int i = v.indexOf(' ');
127            if (i == -1) {
128               httpMethod = v;
129            } else {
130               httpMethod = v.substring(0, i).trim();
131               path = v.substring(i).trim();
132            }
133         } else {
134            al.forEach(x -> ! x.isType(RemoteOp.class) && isNotEmpty(x.getValue(String.class, "value", NOT_EMPTY).orElse("").trim()),x -> value.set(x.getValue(String.class, "value", NOT_EMPTY).get().trim()));
135            if (value.isPresent())
136               path = value.get();
137         }
138
139         if (path.isEmpty()) {
140            path = HttpUtils.detectHttpPath(m, Utils.nullIfEmpty3(httpMethod));
141         }
142         if (httpMethod.isEmpty())
143            httpMethod = HttpUtils.detectHttpMethod(m, true, defaultMethod);
144
145         path = trimSlashes(path);
146
147         if (! isOneOf(httpMethod, "DELETE", "GET", "POST", "PUT", "OPTIONS", "HEAD", "CONNECT", "TRACE", "PATCH"))
148            throw new RemoteMetadataException(m,
149               "Invalid value specified for @RemoteOp(httpMethod) annotation: '"+httpMethod+"'.  Valid values are [DELETE,GET,POST,PUT,OPTIONS,HEAD,CONNECT,TRACE,PATCH].");
150
151         methodReturn = new RemoteOperationReturn(mi);
152
153         fullPath = path.indexOf("://") != -1 ? path : (parentPath.isEmpty() ? urlEncodePath(path) : (trimSlashes(parentPath) + '/' + urlEncodePath(path)));
154
155         mi.getParams().forEach(x -> {
156            RemoteOperationArg rma = RemoteOperationArg.create(x);
157            if (rma != null) {
158               HttpPartType pt = rma.getPartType();
159               if (pt == HEADER)
160                  headerArgs.add(rma);
161               else if (pt == QUERY)
162                  queryArgs.add(rma);
163               else if (pt == FORMDATA)
164                  formDataArgs.add(rma);
165               else if (pt == PATH)
166                  pathArgs.add(rma);
167               else
168                  bodyArg = rma;
169            }
170            RequestBeanMeta rmba = RequestBeanMeta.create(x, AnnotationWorkList.create());
171            if (rmba != null) {
172               requestArgs.add(new RemoteOperationBeanArg(x.getIndex(), rmba));
173            }
174         });
175
176         // Process method-level annotations for defaults (9.2.0)
177         // Note: We need to handle both individual annotations and repeated annotation arrays
178         processHeaderDefaults(mi, headerDefaults);
179         processQueryDefaults(mi, queryDefaults);
180         processFormDataDefaults(mi, formDataDefaults);
181         processPathDefaults(mi, pathDefaults);
182         processContentDefaults(mi);
183      }
184
185      // Helper methods to process method-level annotations with defaults (9.2.0)
186      // These handle both individual annotations and repeated annotation arrays
187
188      private void processHeaderDefaults(MethodInfo mi, Map<String,String> defaults) {
189         // Check for individual @Header annotations
190         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(Header.class, null, x -> {
191            Header h = x.inner();
192            String name = firstNonEmpty(h.name(), h.value());
193            String def = h.def();
194            if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
195               defaults.put(name, def);
196            }
197         });
198         // Check for @Header.Array (repeated annotations)
199         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(HeaderAnnotation.Array.class, null, x -> {
200            for (Header h : x.inner().value()) {
201               String name = firstNonEmpty(h.name(), h.value());
202               String def = h.def();
203               if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
204                  defaults.put(name, def);
205               }
206            }
207         });
208      }
209
210      private void processQueryDefaults(MethodInfo mi, Map<String,String> defaults) {
211         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(Query.class, null, x -> {
212            Query q = x.inner();
213            String name = firstNonEmpty(q.name(), q.value());
214            String def = q.def();
215            if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
216               defaults.put(name, def);
217            }
218         });
219         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(QueryAnnotation.Array.class, null, x -> {
220            for (Query q : x.inner().value()) {
221               String name = firstNonEmpty(q.name(), q.value());
222               String def = q.def();
223               if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
224                  defaults.put(name, def);
225               }
226            }
227         });
228      }
229
230      private void processFormDataDefaults(MethodInfo mi, Map<String,String> defaults) {
231         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(FormData.class, null, x -> {
232            FormData fd = x.inner();
233            String name = firstNonEmpty(fd.name(), fd.value());
234            String def = fd.def();
235            if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
236               defaults.put(name, def);
237            }
238         });
239         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(FormDataAnnotation.Array.class, null, x -> {
240            for (FormData fd : x.inner().value()) {
241               String name = firstNonEmpty(fd.name(), fd.value());
242               String def = fd.def();
243               if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
244                  defaults.put(name, def);
245               }
246            }
247         });
248      }
249
250      private void processPathDefaults(MethodInfo mi, Map<String,String> defaults) {
251         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(Path.class, null, x -> {
252            Path p = x.inner();
253            String name = firstNonEmpty(p.name(), p.value());
254            String def = p.def();
255            if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
256               defaults.put(name, def);
257            }
258         });
259         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(PathAnnotation.Array.class, null, x -> {
260            for (Path p : x.inner().value()) {
261               String name = firstNonEmpty(p.name(), p.value());
262               String def = p.def();
263               if (isNotEmpty(name) && isNotEmpty(def)) {
264                  defaults.put(name, def);
265               }
266            }
267         });
268      }
269
270      private void processContentDefaults(MethodInfo mi) {
271         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(Content.class, null, x -> {
272            Content c = x.inner();
273            String def = c.def();
274            if (isNotEmpty(def)) {
275               contentDefault = def;
276            }
277         });
278         mi.getAnnotationList().forEach(ContentAnnotation.Array.class, null, x -> {
279            for (Content c : x.inner().value()) {
280               String def = c.def();
281               if (isNotEmpty(def)) {
282                  contentDefault = def;
283               }
284            }
285         });
286      }
287   }
288
289   /**
290    * Returns the value of the {@link RemoteOp#method() @RemoteOp(method)} annotation on this Java method.
291    *
292    * @return The value of the annotation, never <jk>null</jk>.
293    */
294   public String getHttpMethod() {
295      return httpMethod;
296   }
297
298   /**
299    * Returns the absolute URI of the REST interface invoked by this Java method.
300    *
301    * @return The absolute URI of the REST interface, never <jk>null</jk>.
302    */
303   public String getFullPath() {
304      return fullPath;
305   }
306
307   /**
308    * Performs an action on the {@link Path @Path} annotated arguments on this Java method.
309    *
310    * @param action The action to perform.
311    * @return This object.
312    */
313   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachPathArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
314      for (RemoteOperationArg a : pathArgs)
315         action.accept(a);
316      return this;
317   }
318
319   /**
320    * Performs an action on the {@link Query @Query} annotated arguments on this Java method.
321    *
322    * @param action The action to perform.
323    * @return This object.
324    */
325   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachQueryArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
326      for (RemoteOperationArg a : queryArgs)
327         action.accept(a);
328      return this;
329   }
330
331   /**
332    * Performs an action on the {@link FormData @FormData} annotated arguments on this Java method.
333    *
334    * @param action The action to perform.
335    * @return This object.
336    */
337   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachFormDataArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
338      for (RemoteOperationArg a : formDataArgs)
339         action.accept(a);
340      return this;
341   }
342
343   /**
344    * Performs an action on the {@link Header @Header} annotated arguments on this Java method.
345    *
346    * @param action The action to perform.
347    * @return This object.
348    */
349   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachHeaderArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationArg> action) {
350      for (RemoteOperationArg a : headerArgs)
351         action.accept(a);
352      return this;
353   }
354
355   /**
356    * Performs an action on the {@link Request @Request} annotated arguments on this Java method.
357    *
358    * @param action The action to perform.
359    * @return This object.
360    */
361   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachRequestArg(Consumer<RemoteOperationBeanArg> action) {
362      for (RemoteOperationBeanArg a : requestArgs)
363         action.accept(a);
364      return this;
365   }
366
367   /**
368    * Returns the argument annotated with {@link Content @Content}.
369    *
370    * @return A index of the argument with the {@link Content @Content} annotation, or <jk>null</jk> if no argument exists.
371    */
372   public RemoteOperationArg getContentArg() {
373      return contentArg;
374   }
375
376   /**
377    * Returns whether the method returns the HTTP response body or status code.
378    *
379    * @return Whether the method returns the HTTP response body or status code.
380    */
381   public RemoteOperationReturn getReturns() {
382      return methodReturn;
383   }
384
385   /**
386    * Performs an action on the exceptions thrown by this method.
387    *
388    * @param action The action to perform.
389    * @return This object.
390    */
391   public RemoteOperationMeta forEachException(Consumer<Class<?>> action) {
392      for (Class<?> e : exceptions)
393         action.accept(e);
394      return this;
395   }
396
397   /**
398    * Returns the default value for a {@link Header @Header} annotation on the method.
399    *
400    * @param name The header name.
401    * @return The default value, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
402    * @since 9.2.0
403    */
404   public String getHeaderDefault(String name) {
405      return headerDefaults.get(name);
406   }
407
408   /**
409    * Returns the default value for a {@link Query @Query} annotation on the method.
410    *
411    * @param name The query parameter name.
412    * @return The default value, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
413    * @since 9.2.0
414    */
415   public String getQueryDefault(String name) {
416      return queryDefaults.get(name);
417   }
418
419   /**
420    * Returns the default value for a {@link FormData @FormData} annotation on the method.
421    *
422    * @param name The form data parameter name.
423    * @return The default value, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
424    * @since 9.2.0
425    */
426   public String getFormDataDefault(String name) {
427      return formDataDefaults.get(name);
428   }
429
430   /**
431    * Returns the default value for a {@link Path @Path} annotation on the method.
432    *
433    * @param name The path parameter name.
434    * @return The default value, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
435    * @since 9.2.0
436    */
437   public String getPathDefault(String name) {
438      return pathDefaults.get(name);
439   }
440
441   /**
442    * Returns the default value for a {@link Content @Content} annotation on the method.
443    *
444    * @return The default value, or <jk>null</jk> if not specified.
445    * @since 9.2.0
446    */
447   public String getContentDefault() {
448      return contentDefault;
449   }
450}
